message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds immense value for us and we believe it would be equally beneficial for you. Considering its worth and the quality it offers, we're extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $9,500. We're confident that this offer strikes a balance between fair market valuation and our desire to share this remarkable product with someone who appreciates its true worth. Please let us know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
